general.name: mos_target_sdss_id_to_catalog
general.description: This table contains the best matched associations between SDSS identifiers (sdss_id, catalogid) and the unique identifiers in the parent catalogues used for SDSS cross-matches. The format of the parent catalogue columns is <table_name>__<column_name>, where <column_name> is the primary key/unique identifier column to which to join in the dr19_<table_name> table.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

pk.name: pk
pk.description: The primary key. A sequential identifier for this table.

sdss_id.name: sdss_id
sdss_id.description: The SDSS identifier for a unique object.

catalogid.name: catalogid
catalogid.description: The associated catalogid for this target. An sdss_id may be associated with multiple catalogids (see dr19_sdss_id_flat).

version_id.name: version_id
version_id.description: The version of the cross-match associated with the catalogid.

lead.name: lead
lead.description: The parent catalog, in the cross-match sequence, that first added this target.
